item.description:
From Newcomer Abe, Santa Mamba, a good Salsa Fusion band, with opening act Route 44, this saturday at the Blackstone. It actually isn't on the Blackstone's website, no idea of cost. Meet before hand to get a corner and maybe a chair or two.

Cover is $7.

From Abe's suggestion
These guys were great live, it's a salsa fusion band. I have seen them at Newport Blues Cafe So we may be able to practice what we learn on Friday at Monet...lol
They have got a show coming up right around the corner in both time and space:

The Blackstone
Saturday, January 16 - 9 pm
1005 Main Street - Pawtucket, RI
www.blackstoneclub.com

It'll be our first appearance at the the Blackstone since the Planet Groove days, and the evening promises an awesome show. We're excited to say that the award-winning Route .44 will be sharing the bill with us. So if you missed the chance to get a ticket to tonight's event please come out next Saturday.
item.name: Santa Mamba Band feat. Route 44
